member.name: M:SAPDAL.ePricerDiscount.IsPTD(System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Pass part no. and SAP sales org (ex: TW01), and returns true if it's a p-trade And when it's p-trade, its product line and sales org's corresponding material pricing group are also returned If it's not p-trade, function will only return false.

member.name: M:SAPDAL.ePricerDiscount.GetZVP2Cost(System.String,System.String,System.String@,System.String@)
member.summary: Get item's price condition ZVP2. This value will be multiplied by ePricer's markup rate to get the final price based on ATW AOnline sales input's price grade. If ZVP2 is not available, this function will return -1.

member.name: M:SAPDAL.SAPDAL.getPriceByProdLine(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: ICC 2015/9/22 Check product belows GP. If product line = 10, then use eA rule. If product line = 20 or other circumstances, then use eP rule.

member.summary: Adding/Updating part's minimum price to/from cache container
